body.name: Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture Body Lotion for Dry Skin, Made with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids + Pure Oat Extract for Nourished, Healthy-Looking Skin 20.3 oz

features: FOR NOURISHED, HEALTHY SKIN: Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture Lotion locks in moisture and deeply nourishes for healthy-looking skin.
FORMULATED WITH ULTRA-HYDRATING LIPIDS: This body lotion for dry skin is formulated with Pure Oat Extract and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture.
FEEL THE DIFFERENCE: This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin).
NON-GREASY FEEL: This fast-acting lotion absorbs quickly to leave your skin hydrated without feeling greasy.
DAILY SKIN CARE: Use Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture Body Lotion as your daily lotion for dry, rough skin. Apply to your skin for long-lasting hydration and noticeably healthier skin.
body.description: Vaseline Intensive Care Essential Healing is now Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture. Made with Pure Oat Extract and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids, Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture Lotion helps keep your skin looking healthy and hydrated. With daily exposure to environmental triggers (like wind, lack of humidity, and sun), skin’s natural moisture barrier can break down, allowing water to escape the skin. But the Ultra-Hydrating lipids in our Nourishing Moisture lotion fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture to allow the skin’s natural barrier to recover. Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture Lotion, formulated with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Pure Oat Extract, locks in moisture and deeply nourishes for healthy-looking skin. This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin). This body lotion for dry skin absorbs fast and provides 48-hour non-greasy moisture. Use this dermatologist-tested body lotion daily on dry, rough skin for stronger, noticeably healthier skin. This Vaseline lotion bottle is made of 50% recycled plastic. Our ambition is to get to 100% recycled plastic in the near future. Since 2018, we've used 337 Metric Tons of recycled plastic across the Vaseline product portfolio in North America. Our Intensive Care range works to heal dry skin from deep within. Explore the range of Vaseline products, including Vaseline lotion, and enjoy the healing power of Vaseline. Vaseline has a range of products to help heal, soothe, and moisturize all skin. We believe skin health is essential for well-being. That’s why Vaseline is working towards giving everybody, everywhere, access to the skin care they need.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture Lotion, with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Pure Oat Extract, moisturises and nourishes for healthy-looking skin. This body moisturizer is tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin).

NOURISHING MOISTURE This body lotion deeply moisturizes for nourished healthy-looking skin. HYDRATING INGREDIENTS Our formula includes Pure Oat Extract and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture. FEEL THE DIFFERENCE This non-greasy body lotion provides 48-hour moisture. A LOTION FOR EVERY SKIN Vaseline has a range of products to help heal, soothe, and moisturize all skin.

Vaseline Intensive Care Care Cocoa Radiant Body Lotion 20.3 oz Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Unscented Hand and Body Lotion 20.3 oz Vaseline Intensive Care Calm Healing Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Main Benefit Vaseline Intensive Care Care Cocoa Radiant Lotion, With Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Pure Cococa Butter, moisturizes skin for a long-lasting, radiant glow. Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Lotion, with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Vaseline Jelly, moisturizes and repairs extremely dry skin. Vaseline Intensive Care Calm Healing Lotion, with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Lavender Extract, soothes and restores dry skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vaseline Intensive Care Moisture Body Lotion
reviews.reviewText: I've always used Vaseline body lotion and have used others that were too greasy or didn't last long. I previously had purchased this product from the store. When I first used it, it has nice scent not overpowering and works great! I had one area I couldn't reach (upper middle back), which is the driest spot on my body. I was able to apply it there and the next day no dryness! For a male, most of us won't have dry skin, but for those that day I recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Year Round Go To!
reviews.reviewText: Amazing 3 pack of my favorite lotion! Non-greasy, dries clear, absorbs easily. Scent is classic scented (it is NOT unscented)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this lotion
reviews.reviewText: I love love love this lotion! It doesn't leave you greasy and it actually soothes and moisturizes your skin below the surface level.It smells good and leaves your skin feeling supple.This is a must buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase overall!
reviews.reviewText: Great scents, works well, and a whole lot of value for the money especially if you buy in batches with subscribe and save. You cannot go wrong with these lotions to get you through those cold, dry winter months. The easy pump makes it all the more worth it than turning the bottle upside down to open and close the lid. highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, not so great pump.
reviews.reviewText: The lotion does a really good job with the dry, cracked skin on my knuckles I get every winter. I gave it 4 stars because of the pump. It is the same on both sides, so if you reach down without checking you can squirt the lotion in the wrong direction all over your night stand, books, or CPAP - which happened to me.Great product, unfortunate design for the pump.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and non-greasy
reviews.reviewText: Worked on my winter dry skin where other well-known brands failed. Great for dry and rough skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best I've Found
reviews.reviewText: I use this cream after my shower on my entire body. The scent is light and very nice. It comes our easily with the nice top, as I don't like the squeeze bottles. Truly, this has helped keep my skin so soft, especially my feet and legs. Nice big bottle, and you get two! Really good stuff. Price is within my budget. Rave reviews is what made me try it, and I am glad I did. You will be satisfied, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is richer than the earlier one I was using. Softens skin and hydrates. I use it on my hands after every wash. Solves the purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 23, 2018

reviews.reviewText: A perfect cream for these dry winter days. Non greasy.
Great product for the price and able to get it without leaving the house.
